text: Paweł Thomik (; born 25 January 1985 in Zabrze) is a Polish-German footballer who currently plays and works as an assistant manager for the reserve team of fourth tier side SV Heimstetten. ==Career== ===Club=== In July 2011, he joined Górnik Zabrze on a three-year contract.Paweł Thomik podpisał trzyletni kontrakt 5.07.2011, gornikzabrze.pl ==References== ==External links== * * Paul Thomik at FuPa Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Polish footballers Category:German people of Polish descent Category:German footballers Category:SpVgg Unterhaching players Category:VfL Osnabrück players Category:FC Bayern Munich II players Category:1. title: Paweł Thomik
